snippet: BLANKSTEIN--Charles Sidney, a career foreign service officer with U.S. Agency for International Development, Latin America, died of congestive heart failure on April 30 in Washington DC. He was 80. He is survived by his wife Lucy; daughter Amy; son Andrew; a daughter-in-law Beth and granddaughter Emma. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Rock Creek Conservancy, 4300 Montgomery Ave., Suite 304, Bethesda, MD 20814. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLANKSTEIN, CHARLES SIDNEY
